answers.answer: Hi Anish,I indeed feel sorry for you and your family that you'll have to go all through all this.Rheumatoid arthritis is a chronic, systemic, autoimmune inflammatory disease affecting synovial joints and extra-articular systems, including the skin, eyes, cardiovascular system, bronchopulmonary system, spleen, and nervous system.I am sorry to say if he has got repeated infection at the wound; it is indeed difficult to say when it would heal.Has he been investigated for Diabetes? This could be one of the causes for delayed healing. The other possibility could be any bleeding disorder or coagulation disorder causing delayed healing or no healing.Is that the wound which is not healing or the bone is not getting healed?I think you need to also see whether there is adequate blood supply to the part or not.Keep me informed if you have any queries.Bye.
